segment.source: Showing Messages Generated by the SUA Tool (Windows 10)
segment.target: Showing Messages Generated by the SUA Tool (Windows 10)

segment.source: On the user interface for the Standard User Analyzer (SUA) tool, you can show the messages that the tool has generated.
segment.target: On the user interface for the Standard User Analyzer (SUA) tool, you can show the messages that the tool has generated.

segment.source: Showing Messages Generated by the SUA Tool
segment.target: Showing Messages Generated by the SUA Tool

segment.source: Applies to
segment.target: Applies to

segment.source: Windows 10
segment.target: Windows 10

segment.source: Windows 8.1
segment.target: Windows 8.1

segment.source: Windows 8
segment.target: Windows 8

segment.source: Windows 7
segment.target: Windows 7

segment.source: Windows Server 2012
segment.target: Windows Server 2012

segment.source: Windows Server 2008 R2
segment.target: Windows Server 2008 R2

segment.source: On the user interface for the Standard User Analyzer (SUA) tool, you can show the messages that the tool has generated.
segment.target: On the user interface for the Standard User Analyzer (SUA) tool, you can show the messages that the tool has generated.

segment.source: To show the messages that the SUA tool has generated
segment.target: To show the messages that the SUA tool has generated

segment.source: Use the SUA tool to test an application.
segment.target: Use the SUA tool to test an application.

segment.source: For more information, see Using the SUA Tool.
segment.target: For more information, see Using the SUA Tool.

segment.source: After you finish testing, in the SUA tool, click the App Info tab.
segment.target: After you finish testing, in the SUA tool, click the App Info tab.

segment.source: On the View menu, click the command that corresponds to the messages that you want to see.
segment.target: On the View menu, click the command that corresponds to the messages that you want to see.

segment.source: The following table describes the commands.
segment.target: The following table describes the commands.

segment.source: View menu command
segment.target: View menu command

segment.source: Description
segment.target: Description

segment.source: Error Messages
segment.target: Error Messages

segment.source: When this command is selected, the user interface shows error messages that the SUA tool has generated.
segment.target: When this command is selected, the user interface shows error messages that the SUA tool has generated.

segment.source: Error messages are highlighted in pink.
segment.target: Error messages are highlighted in pink.

segment.source: This command is selected by default.
segment.target: This command is selected by default.

segment.source: Warning Messages
segment.target: Warning Messages

segment.source: When this command is selected, the user interface shows warning messages that the SUA tool has generated.
segment.target: When this command is selected, the user interface shows warning messages that the SUA tool has generated.

segment.source: Warning messages are highlighted in yellow.
segment.target: Warning messages are highlighted in yellow.

segment.source: Information Messages
segment.target: Information Messages

segment.source: When this command is selected, the user interface shows informational messages that the SUA tool has generated.
segment.target: When this command is selected, the user interface shows informational messages that the SUA tool has generated.

segment.source: Informational messages are highlighted in green.
segment.target: Informational messages are highlighted in green.

segment.source: Detailed Information
segment.target: Detailed Information

segment.source: When this command is selected, the user interface shows information that the SUA tool has generated, such as debug, stack trace, stop code, and severity information.
segment.target: When this command is selected, the user interface shows information that the SUA tool has generated, such as debug, stack trace, stop code, and severity information.
